data.blankContent: If you were asked to name heroes in the field of science, I bet you wouldn't think of the scientist who discovered DNA. That man's ____ was Friedrich Miescher, a Swiss ____ who ____ from 1844 ____ 1895 and ____ at ____ University of Basel. He ____ the body's ____ code ____ materials ____ from a ____ eye. He thought that the discovered substance could be used to make medicines, but instead, the substance was used to develop the DNA fingerprinting system used to solve crimes.
data.partBlankContent: If you were asked to name heroes in the field of science, I bet you wouldn't think of the scientist who discovered DNA. That man's na__ was Friedrich Miescher, a Swiss phys_____ who li___ from 1844 t_ 1895 and wor___ at t__ University of Basel. He isol____ the body's gen____ code us___ materials ta___ from a hu___ eye. He thought that the discovered substance could be used to make medicines, but instead, the substance was used to develop the DNA fingerprinting system used to solve crimes.
data.answer: 如果要你说出科学领域的英雄，我敢打赌你不会想到发现DNA的科学家。这个人的名字叫弗里德里希·米舍尔(Friedrich Miescher)，是一位瑞士医生，生于1844年至1895年，在巴塞尔大学工作。他用从人眼中提取的材料分离出人体的遗传密码。他认为发现的物质可以用来制造药物，但相反，这种物质被用于开发用于破案的DNA指纹系统。
